base_description: Tall, curved, purple faucet with single lever.
part_description: Includes a cylindrical base, curved spout, and single side lever. The spout extends upward and outward, while the lever is positioned on the side of the base.
internal_interaction_description: The lever controls the water flow through an internal valve system. When the lever is lifted or turned, it adjusts the valve to regulate water pressure and temperature, directing water up through the spout.
external_interaction_description: The faucet is mounted on a sink or countertop. Users interact by moving the lever to control water flow and temperature. It connects to plumbing for water supply and directs water into the sink basin.
